description.value:
Sewn from several long strips of luxurious brown and black silk, this cloak grants you a +2 item bonus to Stealth checks as well as to Acrobatics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Maneuver in Flight]{Maneuver in Flight}. You can also use your feet to hang from any surface that can support your weight, without requiring any check, though you still must attempt Athletics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Climb]{Climb} in order to move around while inverted.

Activate D command, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You can either transform the cloak into bat-like wings that grant you a fly Speed of 30 feet for 10 minutes, or have the cloak turn you into a bat by casting a 4th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Pest Form]{Pest Form} spell on you.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Effect: Cloak of the Bat]{Effect: Cloak of the Bat}
